Hi John,

My friend Gary Heitman recommended that I contact you about the startup I have joined. I looked at your code tips and I think your content is just the right stuff and it happens to be the right length too. As a collective, TidBitts has created a way to help speakers, authors and experts generate recurring revenue –and we will help you get new subscribers.

TidBitts wants people who have the right content and even a small following to join us.

To see why up to 30% of your clients’ followers would subscribe to their content if the price was right here is a link to a 40 second consumer video to paint the picture: http://youtu.be/LxEfU1O7ZTM

If it helps, here’s our PDF overview: http://goo.gl/SYbTsJ

We launch in September (notice beta in the URL I included). Any feedback is welcome. I appreciate your opinion.

Sincerely,

Elliott Fey
